ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Lead_Validation_Rule__c = FALSE, NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Partner_Status__c ) ) ), NOT( ISNULL( TEXT(Partner_Status__c )) ), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( Channel__c , 'AR'), ISPICKVAL( Channel__c , 'PAR'), ISPICKVAL( Channel__c , 'Wholesaler/Distributor'), ISPICKVAL( Channel__c , 'System Integrator') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Partner Status is not required for this value of Channel.
